# Learning Objectives

In this lecture, we will

- Introduce Numerical and Visual Summaries of Data

    - We will introduce mean, median, mode, variance, and standard deviation.
    - We discuss scatterplots, histograms, and boxplots for visualizing numerical data.
    - We discuss contingency tables and bar plots for summarizing categorical data.
    - We see how to use R to compute numerical summaries and visualizations for data.
